column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=General How says : " General Fong 's base will serve as the launching point for the attack .
#Text='Cause , the ... sorry .
#Text=" General How says : " All we need is the Earth King 's seal in order to execute the plan .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'll get these scrolls to him right away .
#Text=Thank you , General How .
#Text=" Aang says : " Uhhh ... hello ?
#Text=You 're Guru Pathik , right ?
#Text=The person who attached the note to Appa 's horn ?
#Text=" Pathik says : " Indeed .
#Text=I was a spiritual brother of your people and a personal friend of Monk Gyatso .
#Text=" Aang says : " In your note , you said you could teach me how to gain control of the Avatar State .
#Text=How ?
#Text=" Pathik says : " You must gain balance within yourself , before you can bring balance to the world .
#Text=And the first step to gaining balance begins with this .
#Text=Drink up !
#Text=" Aang says : " Uggh !
#Text=It tastes like onion and banana juice !
#Text=" Pathik says : " That 's because it is !
#Text=Yum yum !
#Text=" Yu says : " I believe we need to go right !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=The Beifong Estate 's this way !
#Text=" Yu says : " I 'm quite certain you 're mistaken .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey !
#Text=Can you two old ladies quit your bickering for a second ?
#Text=I got to go to the bathroom !
#Text=" Yu says : " Oooh ... uhhh , okay , but make it quick !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " What 's wrong with you ?
#Text=" Yu says : " Ooh , very sneaky Toph !
#Text=Nice try , but you ca n't trick me !
#Text=" Toph says : " Let me out of here so I can kick both your butts !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " Quit your banging !
#Text=You might think you 're the greatest earthbender in the world , but even you ca n't bend metal !
#Text="
